name: terrahub
description: terraform automation and orchestration tool. learn more by visiting www.terrahub.io/how-it-works

commands.name: component
commands.description: create new or include existing terraform configuration into current terrahub project

options.name: name
options.description: Uniquely identifiable cloud resource name

options.name: template
options.description: Template name (e.g. aws_ami, google_project)

options.name: directory
options.description: Path to the component (default: cwd)

options.name: depends-on
options.description: List of paths to components that depend on current component (comma separated)

options.name: force
options.description: Replace directory. Works only with template option

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete terrahub configuration files in the component folder

options.name: env
options.description: Workspace environment

options.name: help
options.description: Show list of available commands

commands.name: configure

options.name: global
options.description: Update global config file instead of root or local

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete corresponding configuration parameter

options.description: Auto approve for delete option
